text: Vital Signs is a 1990 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by Marisa Silver and starring Jimmy Smits, Diane Lane, Adrian Pasdar, Jack Gwaltney, Laura San Giacomo, William Devane, Bradley Whitford, Wallace Langham. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1990 romantic comedy movies Category:1990 romantic drama movies Category:1990 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in hospitals
title: Vital Signs (1990 movie)
